kv9.2:1.3: Amataṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ ganthaniyaṃ oghaniyaṃ yoganiyaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ upādāniyaṃ saṃkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:1.7: Hañci amataṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ …pe… asaṃkilesiyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:2.3: Amataṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ rajaniyaṃ kamaniyaṃ madaniyaṃ bandhaniyaṃ mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:2.5: nanu amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:2.7: Hañci amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:3.5: nanu amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:3.7: Hañci amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:4.3: Amataṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ acakkhukaraṇaṃ paññānirodhiyaṃ vighātapakkhiyaṃ anibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:4.5: nanu amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ na acakkhukaraṇaṃ paññābuddhiyaṃ avighātapakkhiyaṃ nibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:4.7: Hañci amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe…
kv9.2:4.8: nibbānasaṃvattaniyaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:5.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ ganthaniyaṃ …pe… saṃkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:5.3: Amataṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, amataṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ …pe… saṃkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:6.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ rajaniyaṃ kamaniyaṃ madaniyaṃ bandhaniyaṃ mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:6.3: Amataṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ …pe… mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:7.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṃ dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:7.3: Amataṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṃ dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:8.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… anibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:8.3: Amataṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṃ mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… anibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:9.1: ☑ Amataṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, amataṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ aganthaniyaṃ anoghaniyaṃ ayoganiyaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ anupādāniyaṃ asaṃkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:9.3: Rūpaṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṃ asaṃyojaniyaṃ aganthaniyaṃ …pe… asaṃkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:10.1: ☑ Amataṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ na rajaniyaṃ na kamaniyaṃ na madaniyaṃ na bandhaniyaṃ na mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:10.3: Rūpaṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṃ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ …pe…
kv9.2:11.1: ☑ Amataṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:11.3: Rūpaṃ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṃ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṃ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṃ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:12.1: ☑ Amataṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… nibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:12.3: Rūpaṃ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṃ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṃ na aññāṇakaraṇaṃ …pe… nibbānasaṃvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:13.5: “nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānāti, nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānitvā nibbānaṃ maññati, nibbānasmiṃ maññati, nibbānato maññati, nibbānaṃ meti maññati, nibbānaṃ abhinandatī”ti.
